summary:
Conversion of West Wind Combat Series - Assault Armor to the 7B-Cleavage Body.
Thanks to  brokefoot for the permission and Crosscrusade - Sevennity's - DeMoNhUnTeR1986 for the 7B bodies.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img31.imageshack.us/img31/5397/q9c4.jpg[/img][/center]

[b][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][color=Slategray] INTRODUCTION [/color][/size][/font][/b]
[size=3]This mod is a conversion of brokefoot's West Wind Combat Series - Assault Armor to the 7B Cleavage Body

The armor has very subtle BBP effect.

There are 2 optional folders in the file.
01 Optional-NonBBP - Install this if you don't want the BBP effect.
02 Optional-Lower pauldron's position - Install this if you want a custom pauldron's position that is closer to the shoulders.

This file only cover some meshes that did not fit the 7B Cleavage body.
So the original armor and all its textures are required! Links below.[/size]

[b][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][color=Slategray] REQUIRED [/color][/size][/font][/b]
[size=3][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31813//?] West Wind Combat Series - Assault Armor [/url][/b] - don't forget to endorse!
[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992//?] SeveNBase FemaleBody Replacer [/url][/b] - don't forget to endorse!
[b][color=crimson]A BBP Skeleton is required or you get a CTD - So choose one [/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800//?] XP32[/url][/b] or  [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16712/?] Skulltyrant's [/url][/b] - don't forget to endorse![/size]

[b][font=Book Antiqua][color=Slategray][size=5pt] CREDITS [/size][/color][/font][/b]
[size=3]Special thanks to [b][color=Lightsteelblue] brokefoot [/color][/b] for making the [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31813//?] West Wind Combat Series - Assault Armor [/url][/b]
Please also endorse Crosscrusade armors!

Much thanks to [b][color=Lightsteelblue] Crosscrusade - Sevennity's - DeMoNhUnTeR1986 [/color][/b] for the 7B body 
and variations!

[b][color=Lightsteelblue] XP32 [/color][/b] and [b][color=Lightsteelblue] Skulltyrant's [/color][/b] for the BBP and TBBP skeletons and a lot of compatibility between mods.
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] Nightasy [/color][/b] for making all the tutorials on 3ds MAX.
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] Shockero [/color][/b] for giving me some finishing tips on converting amors.
[b][color=Lightsteelblue]  ewi65 [/color][/b] for the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34966/?] E ENB. [/url][/size]

[b][color=Lightsteelblue][size=4] My other conversions [/size][/color][/b]
[b][size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45334/?] Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation - 7B-Sevenbase Cleavage BBP [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45344/?] Misfit Mage - 7B-Sevenbase Cleavage BBP [/url] 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45427/?] Nightshade Armor - 7B-Sevenbase Cleavage BBP [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42292//?] Sexy Tsuns Armor Mashup - Sevenbase-7B Cleavage [/url][/b][/size]

Original armor Credits/Thanks:

_MrTroubleMaker - for converting the Torso parts to UNP-BBP and UNPB-BBP.
_Anano - for the Maxwell mesh used as a basis for the Assault Dust Straps.
_Nightasy - for the Nightingale mesh used as a basis for the Assault Pride and for being my sensei for 3dsMax. 
_Fraper - for the Triss pants and other bits of mesh/texture usage as a basis for the Assault Pants and underside of the Alternate Assault Scarfs.
_Exeter - for the Triss boots UNP fix used as a basis for the Assault Boots.
_Kurese - for the Argent shin mesh used as a basis for the Assault Boots.
_Psyke23 - for the Triss textures used as a basis for my own mangling. Oh how I destroyed the quality. Lessons learned.
_Volvaga0 - for his texture compressing magic. Without his aid, we'd be stuck with 100's of MBs of texture data to slug down our PCs.
_NewYorkCityBicycleClub - for the encouragement and support through this making of, and for aiding me with naming the West Wind Merchant.
_Symphoni - for suggestions, support and encouragement during the making of.
_Nanabeats - for giving me permission to use her Nightshade textures, even though they didn't make the cut.

*The original Triss armor concept, mesh and textures are owned and copyrighted by CD Projekt and used here with permission. The Witcher is a trademark of CD Projekt. All rights reserved.
http://www.cdprojekt.com/

files.changelogHtml:
Reworked all body slots - Better compatibility with other mods.
Assault Armor can be crafted at the forge. Armors require Dwarven Smithing perk.
